column7: Design project pertinent to student's field of study. Student will complete a comprehensive written report, develop a website, and/or give an oral presentation that relates to his/her project. 1 to 8 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours.
column9: 1 to 8 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours.
